g:HTMLPanel.p: 1. Acceptance of Terms of Use

LinguaeLive, LLC (LL) provides its on-line services and Website to you subject to this Terms of Service Agreement (“Agreement”). LL reserves the right to alter the Agreement at any time without notice to you. By using the LL website, located at www.LinguaeLive.ca, you agree to abide by this Agreement.
2. Use for Language Exchange Only

You will not use the website to distribute or advertise your commercial activities or those of other parties unless you are an LL approved advertiser. You will not solicit LL members and guests to join outside sites or online services or organizations. You will not solicit LL members and guests for any reason other than to find a language exchange partner to improve the personal foreign language skills of yourself and of your partners. You may not download or utilize any of the content or the material of this website for commercial use that is not expressly authorized by LL in writing.
3. User Accounts

You will select a username and password during the registration process. You are fully responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the username and password. You agree to immediately notify LL should you know, or have reasonable grounds to suspect, that the username and password have been compromised. LL shall not be responsible for your failure to abide by this paragraph.
4. Privacy

Your privacy is very important to us. We designed our Privacy Policy to make important disclosures about how you can use LL to share and meet with others and how we collect and can use your content and information. We encourage you to read the Privacy Policy, and to use it to help make informed decisions.
5. Sharing Your Content and Information

Any content you submit to LL becomes the property of LL. This includes, but is not limited to, ideas, concepts and designs you submit as suggestions to LL. Please be aware that LL may seek (but is not obligated) to verify the identities of its members or guests to ensure that users are students or instructors with a school, college or university. Do not divulge personal contact information such as your telephone number or address in public forums such as message boards or chat rooms. In addition:

A. For content that is covered by intellectual property rights, like photos and videos ("IP content"), you specifically give us the following permission, subject to your privacy settings: you grant us a non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free, worldwide license to use any IP content that you post on or in connection with LL ("IP License"). This IP License ends when you delete your IP content or your account unless your content has been shared with others, and they have not deleted it.
B. When you delete IP content, it is deleted in a manner similar to emptying the recycle bin on a computer. However, you understand that removed content may persist in backup copies for some time.

C. We always appreciate your feedback or other suggestions about LL, but you understand that we may use them without any obligation to compensate you for them (just as you have no obligation to offer them).

D. The content of LL’s website, including the (i) code, modules and software and (ii) the design, text, graphics, and the selection and arrangement thereof, is the property of LL. Certain of the content on this site is provided for use by third parties under agreement with LL. This site is copyrighted by LinguaeLive, LLC. All rights reserved.
6. Safety
We do our best to keep LL safe, but we cannot guarantee it. We need your help to do that, which includes the following commitments:
A. You will not send or otherwise post unauthorized commercial communications (such as spam) on LL.
B. You will not collect users' content or information, or otherwise access LL, using automated means (such as harvesting bots, robots, spiders, or scrapers) without our permission.
C. You will not engage in unlawful multi-level marketing, such as a pyramid scheme, on LL.
D. You will not upload viruses or other malicious code.
E. You will not solicit login information or access an account belonging to someone else.
F. You will not bully, intimidate, or harass any user.
G. You will not post content that is hateful, threatening, pornographic, or that contains nudity or graphic or gratuitous violence.
H. You will not develop or operate a third party application containing, or advertise or otherwise market alcohol-related or other mature content without appropriate age-based restrictions.
I. You will not use LL to do anything unlawful, misleading, malicious, or discriminatory.
J. You will not do anything that could disable, overburden, or impair the proper working of LL, such as a denial of service attack.
K. You will not facilitate or encourage any violations of this Agreement.
7. Registration and Account Security
Here are some commitments you make to us relating to registering and maintaining the security of your account:
A. You will not provide any false personal information on LL, or create an account for anyone other than yourself without permission.
B. You will not use your personal profile for your own commercial gain.
C. If you are under 13 years of age, you will not use LL.
D. You will not use LL if you are a convicted sex offender.
E. You will keep your contact information accurate and up-to-date.
F. You will not share your password, let anyone else access your account, or do anything else that might jeopardize the security of your account.
G. You will not transfer your account to anyone.

H. If you select a username for your account we reserve the right to remove or reclaim it if we believe appropriate (such as when a trademark owner complains about a username that does not closely relate to a user's actual name).
8. Protecting Other People's Rights
A. You will not post content or take any action on LL that infringes or violates someone else's rights or otherwise violates the law.
B. We can remove any content or information you post on LL if we believe that it violates this Agreement.
C. If we remove your content for infringing someone else's copyright, and you believe we removed it by mistake, we will provide you with an opportunity to appeal to LL.
D. If you repeatedly infringe other people's intellectual property rights, we will disable your account if we deem it is appropriate (in our sole discretion).
E. You will not use LL’s copyrights or trademarks or any confusingly similar marks, without our written permission.

F. If you collect information from users, you will: obtain their consent, make it clear you (and not LL) are the one collecting their information, and post a privacy policy explaining what information you collect and how you will use it.
G. You will not post anyone's identification documents or sensitive financial information on LL.

A. The website and services of LL may be supported by advertising revenue and may display advertisements and promotions. These advertisements may be targeted to users based on the content of information provided to or posted on LL, queries made through the website or other information.
B. The manner, mode and extent of advertising LL’s website or through its services are subject to change without notice.

C In consideration for LL granting you access to and use of its website and services, you agree that LL may place such advertising on the website or transmit advertising to you through your user account.

In all such cases, this Agreement shall terminate, but the following provisions will still apply: 5(B), 5(D), 6, 7, 8, 9, and 11-14.
